name: Final Fight Health Bar
author: Moosh
info: Written a while back at the request of Nightmare. Draws simple boss health bars inspired by those featured in Final Fight.
description: Written a while back at the request of Nightmare. Draws simple boss health bars inspired by those featured in Final Fight.
setup:
Set all the C_ constants to appropriate colors for your quest.

Place the FFC on the screen with the following D arguments:D0: The enemy ID of the boss enemy. If <=0, the script will use the HP pool of all enemies on the screenD1: A string with the boss's nameD2: A 1x1 tile with a boss portraitD3: The CSet to draw the portrait inD4: Set to 1 to automate the color ranges based on the boss's starting HPD5: Set to the number of colors to use if using the previous settingD6: Special exceptions1: Summoner. Enemies spawned after the first aren't included in the boss's HP pool.

This script requires std.zh.
